comment.body: Hubs hold user data for ZeroMe. Posts made by users, images, etc. The main ZeroMe site only contains the code needed for ZeroMe to operate. To view user data you need to add Hubs as merger sites to ZeroMe. You automatically get the hub you choose when you join, but other users may be on other hubs so you need to connect to them to see posts by those users,

@Swashbuckler: That's my understanding, yes. If you click on a users profile and it says that you can't see it then you don't have their hub connected up. I only know of the site [0hub.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0hub.bit) that allows you to add multiple hubs to zerome. I still have profiles I can't see though so maybe I'm missing hubs.
